title: LuckPerms 临时权限 用于 TrMenu
author: zu00495907
txt_content:
我想让 TrMenu 菜单 能冷却时间
但是 该怎样设定 不知道

replies.author: 幽冥冥灬
replies.txt_content:

replies.txt_content:
幽冥冥灬 发表于 2020-7-23 23:15

用了 变量没显示 时间

replies.author: xiao_wo
replies.txt_content:
zu00495907 发表于 2020-7-24 00:03
用了 变量没显示 时间
需下载 LuckPerms 的 PlaceholderAPI 变量拓展 /papi ecloud download LuckPerms /papi reload

replies.author: xiao_wo
replies.txt_content:
xiao_wo 发表于 2020-7-24 02:11
需下载 LuckPerms 的 PlaceholderAPI 变量拓展 /papi ecloud download LuckPerms /papi reload
如果指令无法下载自行到：https://api.extendedclip.com/expansions/luckperms/ 下载丢进\plugins\PlaceholderAPI\expansions 然后输入papi reload

replies.author: zu00495907
